name: Wild Animal Transporting Crane 3D Full
description:
Drive your transporter truck - animal trailer - carefully to deliver your living cargo in time! Enjoy unusual racing and transport simulator with Wild Animal Transporting Crane 3D!
Be a driver of special animal transport truck - deliver escaped beasts to their home or catch new animals! Transport animals to the destination – zoo, or pet shop - and earn points. Unlock new trucks or upgrade the old one to be faster and have more space for escaped animals. Gain ultimate driving experience controlling an animal trailer truck!
Use the map to find escaped animal, then catch it with your net and load animal to your truck! Don’t forget about cattle safety – drive accurately to avoid car accidents on narrow country roads! Transport safari animals with your cargo truck and feel like a real trucker sitting behind the wheel of a huge car transporter!
Catch and return all fugitive animals using your net-catcher and driving your mighty truck! Chase and transport and enjoy with Wild Animal Transporting Crane 3D
Wild Animal Transporting Crane 3D features:
Challenging animal truck transporting missions
Wide range of exotic animals to transport: bear, wolf, tiger, lion, zebra, deer and even crocodile
Mini-map to ease your task
Varies cargo trucks and animal trailers to unlock
Play Wild Animal Transporting Crane 3D and help bear, wolf, tiger, lion, zebra, deer and even crocodile to return to their corral, pet shop or zoo!
